sql_query:
SELECT
    o.order_id,
    o.order_date,
    o.amount,
    c.customer_name,
    c.email
FROM test_orders o
LEFT JOIN test_customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.amount > 500
sql_full:
SELECT
    o.order_id,
    o.order_date,
    o.amount,
    c.customer_name,
    c.email
FROM test_orders o
LEFT JOIN test_customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.amount > 500
